info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 1:10PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Montezuma and southwestern La Plata Counties through 145 PM MDT... At 109 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Mancos, or 16 miles west of Durango, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Montezuma and southwestern La Plata Counties, including the following locations... Mayday, Hesperus, Breen, Redmesa, Kline, La Plata and Marvel. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 160 in Colorado between mile markers 57 and 74. Colorado 140 between mile markers 7 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
